summary: Support sellers to query the evidence uploaded through the upload evidence API
description: Support sellers to query the evidence uploaded through the upload evidence API.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/returns/get_return_dispute_reason?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&return_sn=2412120MA60NDP1&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: dispute_reason
schema.description: The dispute_reason for one specific case. See Data Definition - DisputeReason. Note: This field will be sunset on 2025-03-31, please switch to use dispute_reason_list to get the dispute_reason and associated evidence list.

schema.name: dispute_reason_list
schema.description: The dispute_reason and associated evidence list.

schema.name: dispute_reason
schema.description: The dispute_reason for one specific case. See Data Definition - DisputeReason.

schema.name: dispute_requirement
schema.sample: Regarding to your refund request, Shopee would like to request more information as follows :
schema.description: Indicate the importance of uploading required proof.

schema.name: sample_evidence
schema.description: The URL of sample evidence to upload.

schema.name: type
schema.description: The type of sample evidence. Applicable value: - 1: Image

schema.name: thumbnail
schema.description: The link of the thumbnail of sample evidence.

schema.name: evidence_module_list
schema.description: The associated evidence module list for current dispute reason.

schema.name: module_index
schema.description: The index of current evidence module.

schema.name: requirement
schema.sample: Photo(s) or Video of unboxing the returned parcel with the consignment note (Airway Bill).
schema.description: The specific requirement of current evidence module.

schema.name: is_required
schema.description: Indicate if current evidence module is mandatory or not.

error_codes.message: Can't raise dispute because the dispute reason is empty
